Package CarAndMap

Class GamepanelCAM

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
CarAndMap.GamepanelCAM
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GamepanelCAM
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Title: Distributed multiplayer racing game.

Description: Local two player car race game operating from the same keyboard.

Date: 21/04/2023
Version:
1.2
Author:
labuj 2018481

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkCarCollision​(java.awt.Graphics g, TrackCAM track)
    Checks for collision between cars and track boundaries.
    int chooseTrack()
    User select track on program open.
    void greenLeft()
    Change green car current image by negative one.
    void greenRight()
    Change green car current image by positive one
    void lapCount​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    Calculate and update lap count according to passing rectangles at start and at halfway point.
    void moveImage()
    Move each car according to current image instigated by speed control key press
    void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    Paint the racetrack of choice, allow car to move and checkCollision if animation is running.
    void policeLeft()
    Change police car current image by negative one.
    void policeRight()
    Change police car current image by positive one.
    void resetAllCars()
    Move cars back to start line and set boolean go to true to display ready text while verbal countdown plays.
    void resetGo()
    Plays a 3,2,1,go countdown sound file while display ready text, restarts animation and stops displaying text on countdown completion.
    void setCarSpeed​(int carSpeed, int carId)
    Used in mainframe to add 1 to speed on each key press
    void startAnimation()
    Start animation, restart if not active.
    void stopAnimation()
    Stop animation to use in a car collision and end the game.

    • paintComponent

      public void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Paint the racetrack of choice, allow car to move and checkCollision if animation is running.

      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object to protect

    • chooseTrack

      public int chooseTrack()
      User select track on program open. Return 0 for rectangle track 1 and 1 for oval track 2

    • startAnimation

      public void startAnimation()
      Start animation, restart if not active.

    • stopAnimation

      public void stopAnimation()
      Stop animation to use in a car collision and end the game.

      public void setCarSpeed​(int carSpeed, int carId)
      Used in mainframe to add 1 to speed on each key press
      Parameters:
      carSpeed - - speed of car in integer
      carId - - id of car in integer

      public void moveImage()

    • checkCarCollision

      public void checkCarCollision​(java.awt.Graphics g, TrackCAM track)
      Checks for collision between cars and track boundaries. Returns opposite speed direction (for fun) on collision with boundary (bounce) or end game for collisions between cars.
      Parameters:
      g - - graphics interface

    • lapCount

      public void lapCount​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Calculate and update lap count according to passing rectangles at start and at halfway point.
      Parameters:
      g - - graphics interface

    • resetGo

      public void resetGo()
      Plays a 3,2,1,go countdown sound file while display ready text, restarts animation and stops displaying text on countdown completion.

    • resetAllCars

      public void resetAllCars()
      Move cars back to start line and set boolean go to true to display ready text while verbal countdown plays.
